page.title: 12SPORT AND LEISURE. TREDIS
page.content: SPORT IN THE AREA IS MAINLY CONNECTED WITH THE FARMS - HUNTING AND SHOOTING- AND WITH THE SEA- FISHING, SAILING, SURFING,SWIMMING. THERE ARE VERY FEW FLAT AREAS FOR BALL SPORTS. BEAGLES HUNT THE CLIFF AREAS AND WOODS. THERE ARE SMALL ORGANIZED SHOOTS OVER ROUGH LAND ON THE FARMS FOR FOXES,GAME AND RABBITS; PHEASANTS ARE SHOT IN POLBATHIC AND TOODLE OODLE WOODS.THERE IS RIVER FISHING AT POLBATHIC,AND SEA FISHING AT DOWNDERRY A FEW HORSES ARE KEPT FOR PRIVATE RIDING,AND AN ANNUAL CHARITY GYMKHANA IS HELD AT TRIFFLE.HANG GLIDING IS DONE FROM THE CLIFFS AT TRIFFLE. POLBATHIC HAS A DANCING CLASS AND DRAMATIC SOCIETY WHICH PRODUCE TWO OR THREE SHOWS A YEAR,AND THE VILLAGE HALL COMMITTEE THERE ORGANIZE FETES AND FUND-RAISINGS. GUIDE CAMPS ARE HELD AT MINARD.
